title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself cleaning tiles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning tiles in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the face of tiles on the ground indicates goodness, removing sorrows and neglect, providing goodness and food, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions. Likewise, seeing marble in a dream indicates the proximity of comfort, the death of distress if imprisoned, and the death of anxiety if he wishes, and God knows best. If a person dreams that he is making tiles, then this vision indicates some of the experiences and difficulties that the dreamer was going through. Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams that she is washing the country and cleaning it well, this indicates her closeness to a righteous young man, and God knows best. Also, seeing the cleaning of tiles in a dream for unmarried women indicates the death of illusions, sorrows, and disputes that you would have gone through, and distinction and success. Also, seeing the countryside cleaning the house of an unmarried girl is evidence that there is someone who will come to propose to her in the near future and marry her in a short time. If this girl faced some problems in a dream and saw that she was cleaning the tiles in a dream, this indicates that these problems will end soon. Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is cleaning Tiles in her dream, this indicates the collapse of the differences and problems that arose between her and her husband. Also, seeing tiles in a dream cleaned of dirt and dust indicates the purification of the girl from sins and hardships and removing them from immorality. Also, seeing the tiles shiny and cleaning them as if they were new means that she is pregnant soon and that her husband will get a new job and will be promoted in his job soon. Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is cleaning tiles, this means that the date of birth will be specified and her pregnancy period will be easy, God knows best. Also, seeing tiles being removed in a dream indicates a malignant disease that haunts that pregnant woman and indicates the death of her son. And if she sees in her dream that she is removing tiles, this indicates instability and material losses that her husband suffers from. Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning tiles in a dream for a man Cleaning tiles indicates his good work that he will participate in, and it also indicates his imminent marriage to a righteous girl, and God knows best. Also, seeing tiling in a man’s dream indicates sustenance, sophistication, and a quiet life full of joy, pleasure, and happiness. Also, seeing sparkling tiles indicates the collapse of worries and problems, and his admiration for a girl, and it also indicates his entry New job. Interpretation of a dream about breaking the tiles of a house If one sees in a dream that the tiles of his house are cracked, this indicates the emergence of problems and misfortunes that this person will go through in the coming period. Likewise, if one dreams of breaking the tiles of a house, this indicates the materials that will suffer and the loss of income. Interpretation of cleaning tiles with water in a dream Seeing one cleaning tiles with water in a dream indicates that the dreamer's circumstances will change and make his days better and God will comfort him. Seeing the purification of the earth in a dream is one of the good dreams that show the dreamer good and

title: The death of a mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Death of the mother in a dream We will provide you with an interpretation of the death of the mother in a dream. Everyone knows that the mother is a source of security and tenderness for her children and it is impossible to live without her and that life becomes difficult when she dies. We will learn the interpretation of this dream through the following lines: Death of the mother in a dream The interpretation of the dream of the death of the mother in a dream explains the high status and high position of the dreamer and gaining a high status in the near future, and seeing the sad dead mother in a dream shows the bad behavior of the visionary and doing things contrary to the advice and instructions of the mother. Seeing the death of the mother while she is in reality seriously ill shows that her death is close to reality. Death of the mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said and stressed that seeing the mother in a dream is one of the good and commendable dreams that indicate goodness, blessing and livelihood in all aspects of her life. Ibn Sirin said and confirmed that the dream of the death of a living mother is one of the undesirable dreams and a bad vision for the dreamer.. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin's dreams and visions A site about the secrets of interpreting dreams from Google. Death of the mother in a dream for unmarried people If an unmarried woman sees the death of her mother in her dream, this means that she lacks self-control and a sense of security. She is constantly looking for feelings that can make her feel a new life. If a single mother dies in a dream and the girl does not cry over her, this indicates that there are many psychological problems in her life. He finds it difficult to get away from her, or these problems are so complicated that his energy may run out. Interpretation scholars specializing in dream interpretation said that when she sees the death of her mother in an unmarried girl's dream and that she cried a lot, this may mean that she will end her long problems, suffering, sorrows and anxiety. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is dreaming of her mother's funeral and there are many people attending the funeral, then the days that herald happiness will come soon and many people will come to celebrate this occasion. When an unmarried girl dreams of the death of her mother, this indicates that the girl is looking for a husband. This partner has a great compensatory effect on her that makes her life better. Happiness enters her and her correct choice of him. When a virgin cries over her mother in a dream, this indicates the end of problems, the approach of weakness and the end of a bad period in the girl's life. The death of the mother in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees the death of her mother in a dream, this is evidence of all the good things in her life. This means that all the problems she has gone through in her life are gone. When a married woman dreams that her mother is comforting her in a dream, this indicates that your husband's business is prosperous and earns a lot of money. If a married woman sees her mother's death in her dream and covers her, this means that she will go on Umrah or Hajj with her mother. When you see her hugging her mother in a dream, the dream of carrying your mother around your neck indicates that the dreamer's status in life is very high. If the mother dies and is buried in a dream and there is no crying, this means that the mother is sick or tired, but she will recover, God knows best. Death

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car key in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a car key in a dream? Interpretation of a vision: Dream keys are generally evidence of getting rid of problems and the end of sorrows and worries. Also, seeing a key chain in a dream is one of the visions that the dreamer will achieve success, high status, and high standing. The interpretation of seeing a wooden car key in a dream indicates the help of a fortuneteller. And supporting someone close to him. Also, seeing a car without a key in a dream indicates some people who are not useful in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a car key lying on the road in a person’s dream means reaching the hidden truth and secret. Interpretation of a dream about a car key for a single woman: Seeing a car key in A single woman’s dream expresses her generally praiseworthy vision, which indicates success. Seeing a car key in a single woman’s dream is a sign that she will achieve some useful goals. The interpretation of seeing a car key in a single woman’s dream also means that you are opening the doors of kindness, sustenance, and happiness to her. Driving in a car in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the dreams that indicate her imminent engagement and marriage to a good person. Interpretation of a dream about a car key for a married woman When she sees her husband’s car key in a woman’s dream, this means her transition to a better life. Seeing a car key in a dream for a woman Being married is good news and a sign of benefit and improvement in circumstances. Also, seeing a house key in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will obtain good and ample sustenance. Losing a key in a dream for a married woman is one of the unwanted visions and a sign of worry and anxiety. What is the interpretation of a car key in a dream? For a pregnant woman? The interpretation of seeing a car key in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that God will bless her with a good child. Seeing a car key in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates ease of delivery and ease of circumstances and situations. Seeing many keys in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news, happiness and strength. Great from God. Interpretation of a dream about a car key for a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing keys in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the end of her problems and alleviation of her worries and sorrows. Also, seeing a divorced woman finding a car key in a dream means that she will marry a good man. A car key in a dream for a man. Interpretation of seeing a man breaking a key A car in his dream means that he is deceived and betrayed by someone close to him. Seeing keys in a dream is generally considered one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate happiness, goodness, and the end of problems. A car key in a man’s dream is a door to livelihood and goodness that will open before him a great benefit from his work and trade. Interpretation of a dream about losing a car key. Interpretation of losing a car key in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate missed opportunities, failure, and lack of luck. Losing your car key and finding it again in your dream is a sign that things will improve and good things will return. Interpretation of a dream about starting a car with a key. title: Learn the interpretation of seeing chocolate in a dream

preview.html: Seeing chocolate in a dream is a common thing because chocolate is one of the foods we eat constantly and daily. Is a dream in which I see myself eating white chocolate a different interpretation than a dream in which I eat dark chocolate? You will find the answer to all these questions here in this topic. Seeing chocolate in a dream Seeing chocolate in a dream is one of the things that carries many distinctive signs, which we will learn about through the following: If a woman sees chocolate in her dream, this symbolizes getting rid of her anxiety and rejection. For as many problems as it was. It disturbs her life and makes her feel constantly sad. While the person who sees chocolate in his dream shows that he obtains his daily diet and livelihood from halal food and does not accept to eat forbidden food in any way, which makes his life a blessing and permanent wealth. Increase. Seeing chocolate in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Compared to eating sweets in the time of the scholar Ibn Sirin, eating chocolate in a dream indicates many beautiful and distinctive changes in the lives of the dreamers who observe them and want to understand the desired connections behind them. Likewise, the young man who sees in his dream that he is eating chocolate. This vision shows the fulfillment of many wishes that he had always wanted and hoped would happen to him, and this is because of his efforts in life and his lack of dependence on what made him worthy of this blessing. While for a woman who sees chocolate being stolen in her dream, this symbolizes the occurrence of many things for her. For her, which has no negative consequences at all. The Secrets for Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Every moment is happy for her death. Seeing chocolate in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her partner offers her a piece of chocolate in her dream, this symbolizes that she lives a happy life with him in which there are no problems or disagreements that they cannot deal with or control in any way. In addition, she has beautiful skin so she will be able to give birth to a beautiful child soon. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about geckos on the body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about geckos on the body: Some of us are surprised by the name gecko, because what is known is a gecko, which is one of the animals that belong to the lizard family and is often characterized by many colors such as grey, brown, green, or yellow. There are toxic and non-toxic substances, but what about the interpretation of the dream about being distributed in the body? In answering this question, scientists have put forward many different interpretations that have positive and negative connotations, as we will see in this article. Interpretation of a dream about geckos on the bodyInterpretation of a dream about geckos on the body has many different meanings, such as: Seeing poisonous geckos on his body in a dream means that the dreamer He will be exposed to envy that will cause him great harm. Ibn Shaheen interprets seeing a gecko on his body in the dreamer’s dream as a sign that there is an enemy waiting for him. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is afflicted with leprosy, Ibn Shirin gives her good tidings of her offspring. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream of a poisonous black gecko on a pregnant woman’s body as a demonic touch or Harm from the jinn, because the movement of leprosy is very fast and symbolizes the supernatural power of the jinn. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing an uncle in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing your cousin in a dream. Different meanings and interpretations, and we have collected for you interpretations from the main interpretation books, so today let us learn with you the interpretation of seeing your cousin in a dream, married, pregnant and men. Imam Al-Sadiq completed the interpretation of seeing your cousin in a dream. A perfect cousin in a dream indicates his great livelihood and good marriage. From a girl from his close circle whom he loves very much. Also, seeing a cousin in a dream whole indicates the bond and return that the sister or relatives see, as well as the death of troubles and sorrows. If one sees his cousin dead in his dream, then this dream indicates a close marriage, but God He does not approve of it. As for the vision of Al-An’ad marrying her cousin, this vision shows their marriage in reality, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing a cousin in a dream is completed by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees a full cousin in a dream, then this vision indicates... A lot of livelihood and money. Also, seeing one’s uncle marrying a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller’s circumstances will improve for the better, for the better, for honor, and for high status. If the girl Aa sees in her dream that her cousin is engaged to her in her dream, then this is good news of their marriage in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision A cousin in a dream full of a woman’s bowl. When a woman sees a bowl in her dream that she is talking to her cousin, this indicates the differences and heartbreaks that she will see in her life. Also, seeing her cousin wearing clean clothes in a full dream indicates his close marriage to one of the girl’s friends. Seeing The cousin is exposed to an accident while chasing his family in the hospital, so this indicates that his condition has actually improved for the better, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a full dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her full cousin in a dream, this vision indicates the existence of a relationship at the time distress and standing by her side in difficult ordeals. Likewise, if she sees her martyr cousin in a dream, it means that she will get pregnant soon, the pregnancy period will be easy and the boy will be called a martyr. Also, seeing a full cousin in a dream means joys and a life full of goodness and happiness and the removal of problems And the worries that she sees in her life. When a married woman sees in a dream a cousin laughing, this vision may indicate the arrival of happy, joyful, and good news. Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a complete dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees her beloved cousin in her dream, this indicates psychological comfort and tranquility. And reassurance and ease of childbirth. Also, seeing a pregnant woman’s cousin indicates that her husband is entering into new professions, but with a lot of profits and money, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a cousin in a man’s dream: If a man sees in a dream his entire close friend and his cousin, then this vision shows the urgent need that He sees it in reality. Also, seeing his cousin’s clothes clean in a dream completely indicates his marriage to a good girl and his abundant life, God willing. Accordingly, if he sees that he is walking in his cousin’s funeral, this indicates the misfortunes that the dreamer sees in his dream and the abundance of wealth.

title: Interpretation of the name Sondos in a dream

preview.html: Sundus: Persian female name, a type of woven silk or brocade (they wear green clothes made of sundus) - Surah Al-Kahf - Verse 31- The word Sundus in a dream means bliss, prosperity, contentment and money. Likewise, the name of the one who heard it in a dream, shouted it, screamed it, pronounced it, pronounced it, or wrote it down. This name is engraved on an ornament, garment, door, or shop. It means ample sustenance or goodness even to the dreamer. It is also praiseworthy in the interpretation and interpretation of dreams to see a girl or woman named Sundos who is close to the dreamer and not the sister, mother, or wife. For example, be a friend, neighbor, or colleague. Interpretation of the name Sundus in a dream for a single woman: If any of the unmarried women see the name or fame of Sundus, then it foretells either money, kindness, or the awaited blessing. The interpretation stated that the names of silk and gold in a dream indicate prosperity, blessing, and contentment. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream a woman she knows or a girl named Sundus, this is a good interpretation if the dreamer hopes to obtain something or accept something. It is recommended to interpret the name Sundus in The dream of an unmarried woman, if he sees her shaking her hand, or talking to her about a good topic, or saying something good to her, or receiving her or giving her something good. . . If an unmarried woman longs for something and dreams of getting it from the woman called Sodus, she will achieve it, God willing, while she is awake. Accompanying her in one dream is praiseworthy, as is walking with her in the street or accompanying her in a car, bus, or train. The meaning of the dream, then, is that the dreamer lives in bliss, and enjoys what he wants - and God knows best. Read also: Washing dishes and kitchen utensils in a dream. Interpretation of the name Sundos in a married woman’s dream. Kindness is a good thing for a married woman to hear this name in a dream, especially if she is in need or needs money. . Because one of the meanings of sundus in a dream is money. It is said that the name is praised when it is written or seen engraved in gold or silk. Sundus also signify graces and blessings for the married couple, which was demonstrated by beautiful decoration and a dark embroidered veil. The good thing is that Sondos appeared in a long dress, covering her head, and revealing her face and hands with a satisfied smile on her face. It was nice to see the kindness and calm in her eyes. The good thing is that a married woman sees her entering her house, knocking on her door, staying with her, or eating her food. It is also good for a visionary to talk about something she wants, such as announcing her pregnancy, the return of an expatriate, or reconciliation with her husband. The name is praiseworthy for the word, as it was chosen by (Ibn Sirin) and it was said that it is one of the names of bliss and prosperity. The name is clear news if Sodus is the one who appeared in the dream as a childhood friend, schoolmate, or old neighbor. The less the character is in consciousness, the more stable its meaning is in the dream. As for a pregnant woman, the name indicates the birth of a boy. Because the names of silk in a dream refer to males, as do the names of gold. In addition, this name carries many good connotations that often coincide with the dreamer's dreams. Provided that

title: Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream in detail

preview.html: Dreaming about a gun carries many interpretations and interpretations, some good and some bad. Here is the detailed interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream. Explanation of seeing a gun in a dream in detail. If you dream that you are buying a weapon, this means that you are taking the right steps to achieve your goals. If you dream that you are loading a weapon, this warns you of excessive fanaticism, so you must keep your nerves calm and under control in your real life. This may also indicate your ability to defend yourself in a situation where you are exposed. When a person sees himself unloading a gun in a dream, this indicates the ebb and flow of a previously stressful time, and that he is ready to take a break before facing any additional threat or indicates that you need to relax and reduce stress. Time. A dream of carrying a weapon in the countryside means that the dreamer is proud of his strength and confidence. A dream that hides a gun in a dream after preparing to shoot means that the dreamer is suppressing his angry feelings and thoughts and is trying to find ways to express himself instead of increasing his anger. To dream that you have a gun pointed at you may Reflecting your status in the spotlight and your fear of the consequences of refusing requests or orders directed at you in real life, this may indicate that you feel trapped or obligated to serve others. To dream that you are exchanging or shooting back in a gunfight means that you are on the defensive about something What.If you dream that you are chasing a gun with someone, it means that you are trying to escape from figures who impose power in your life.Seeing a sniper in a dream means careful planning and choosing targets well.Explaining seeing a gun in a dream in detail.Interpreting the dream of owning a pistol and a rifle in a dream.It may mean dreaming of owning A weapon that does not shoot or does not work means that you need to deal with the problems of your life from a different and new perspective. To dream that you have an inappropriate weapon means that you are putting your time and effort in the wrong place. To dream that you are using a BB gun or a toy gun means that you desire more power and strength. Dreaming about a weapon represents dangerous choices with serious consequences, or dangerous choices and reactions on the part of the viewer who feels threatened by a dangerous choice that may embarrass you or cause you to lose. If you are carrying a weapon in a dream, this reflects your interest or desire to make a serious decision to stop something. Or defending yourself. To dream that your gun malfunctions or runs out of bullets while shooting, means that your efforts may be in vain. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a gun If you shoot something with a gun, this symbolizes that you have made a decision to defend yourself and that you are not Afraid to make a serious decision against something that you do not like or that poses an emotional danger to you. A dream about shooting yourself with a gun indicates a person’s shrewd refusal to confront what is going on. A dream that you accidentally shoot yourself represents your excessive embarrassment and lack of care while preparing to defend yourself or make a serious decision, It also represents not being careful or taking enough responsibility, or your disdain for a serious choice or a certain plan that ends up hurting you. It is like a dream in which

title: Interpretation of a dream about a little boy according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribed Fans Interpretation of a dream about a young boy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A boy in a dream has many interpretations that many do not know, and this dream is seen by a large number of people. Some say that seeing a boy in a dream is a sign of goodness, but Ibn Sirin emphasized that some visions are not good. Today, through our article, we will explain to you in detail the interpretation of a boy’s dream, whether in a man’s or a woman’s dream, because each of them seeing a boy in a dream indicates different connotations and symbols. Interpretation of a dream about a boy by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a child in a dream is a bad omen. A boy in a dream may indicate some problems that the dreamer will face. If someone is in a misfortune and sees a boy in his dream, this is evidence of his salvation from these misfortunes in the near future. If a person sees a boy in a dream while he is On his way to trade, he will lose his money. A young child in a dream shows weakness and destiny. If one sees in a dream that he is carrying a boy, this is a sign of new jobs and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about a boy in Nabulsi: Seeing a boy inside the house in a dream is a sign of distress, stress, and suffering. If he can see inside the dream, a big boy is a sign of the legacy that this visionary will carry. Seeing a boy with long hair is evidence of hatred, betrayal, and hypocrisy on the part of one of his friends. Whoever sees a fasting boy in his dream, this indicates kindness and nourishment. Buying a boy in a dream indicates distress. And anxiety.Interpretation of a boy seeing an unmarried woman.A boy in a dream shows the problems he will face if he gets engaged.A boy’s long hair in a dream indicates hatred and separation from his lover.If a girl is planning to get married and sees a boy in the dream, this means that she will get married soon.Interpretation of a boy’s dreamSeeing a boy in A man’s dream is evidence that he hears bad news. Seeing a boy with long hair in a man’s dream is a sign that he will be exposed to some financial crises. Interpretation of a boy’s dreams for a married woman: If a married woman sees a boy in a dream, it is evidence of many problems that she is going through. A boy in a married woman’s dream is evidence of wisdom in Some personal decisions. If she sees a boy with long hair, this indicates her husband’s betrayal of her. Interpretation of a boy’s dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a child in a dream is a bad omen. If a pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth to a child, she will give birth to a girl. If she sees a blond boy, the dream is evidence that she will give birth to healthy twins and that the birth It will be easy. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and explain it.
